name: NAP GUARDIAN
description:
You've just been hired as the personal security for a high profile entertainer. Protect their nap at all costs, using your trusty sword.

## Controls
### Arrows + ZXC

Move: Left / Right
Attack: Z
Dash: X
Bomb: C
Shop: Down

### WASDQ + Shift + Space

Move: A / D
Attack: Space
Dash: Shift
Bomb: Q
Shop: S

Made in 48 hour for Ludum Dare 50.
